bForceOneSmoothingGroupPerObject: Whether or not to force smooth normals for each individual object rather than calculating smoothing groups
HardEdgeAngleThreshold: Threshold used to determine whether an angle between two normals should be considered hard, closer to 0 means more smooth vs 1
bRecomputeNormals: Determines whether or not the normals should be forced to be recomputed
bIgnoreDegenerateTriangles: Determines whether or not the degenerate triangles should be ignored when calculating tangents/normals
bSkipComputingTangents: Determines whether tangents are computed for GeometryCache. Skipping them can improve streaming performance but may cause visual artifacts where they are required
